Note: The paragraph mentions "monoamines" but it is a class of neurotransmitters that includes several chemicals such as serotonin, dopamine, and norepinephrine. However, in the context of the paragraph, it is clear that only norepinephrine (NA) is being referred to as a specific chemical entity. Therefore, monoamines as a class is not a valid entity in this context.
